pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiple Contrast Tests for Functional Data // The provided package implements multiple contrast tests for functional data (Munko et al., 2023, arXiv:2306.15259). These procedures enable us to evaluate the overall hypothesis regarding equality, as well as specific hypotheses defined by contrasts. In particular, we can perform post hoc tests to examine particular comparisons of interest. Different experimental designs are supported, e.g., one-way and multi-way analysis of variance for functional data.
